meanings.definition: Not able to be deducted from taxable income.
meanings.sent1: The nondeductible expenses could not be subtracted from the total income.
meanings.sent2: The accountant explained that the donation was nondeductible on the tax return.
meanings.sent3: Trying to claim the luxury vacation as nondeductible was a costly mistake.
meanings.sent4: The nondeductible fees weighed heavily on the financial burden.
meanings.sent5: The concept of nondeductible costs was crystal clear after the explanation.

meanings.sent1: The nondeductible items were clearly marked on the receipt.
meanings.sent2: She realized the nondeductible purchases were affecting her tax refund.
meanings.sent3: The attempt to make the nondeductible expenses disappear failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: The nondeductible status of the investment surprised many shareholders.
meanings.sent5: The nondeductible nature of the expense hit him hard during tax season.
